heroIntro: Discover sophisticated villa living at La Finca Golf, where European elegance meets Mediterranean tranquility. This exceptional 6-bedroom villa represents a premium investment opportunity in Algorfa, one of Costa Blanca's most discerning communities. At €2,213 per square meter, this property commands a significant premium over the local average of €1,600/m², reflecting its superior specification, meticulous construction quality, and prestigious golf resort setting. Unlike comparable properties in crowded coastal towns—where prices exceed €4,400/m²—this villa offers extraordinary value without compromise on prestige or exclusivity. With 436 square meters of thoughtfully designed living space set on a 310-square-meter plot, this home caters to discerning international buyers seeking both privacy and access to world-class amenities. The property's strategic position within La Finca Golf provides residents with an exclusive community atmosphere, English-speaking services, and immediate access to championship golf courses. Whether seeking a primary residence, investment property, or Mediterranean retreat, this villa exemplifies the sophisticated lifestyle that distinguishes successful expatriates throughout Costa Blanca.
areaSection: Algorfa stands as one of Alicante's most prestigious inland communities, positioned strategically between coastal attractions and the tranquil hinterland. Located approximately 50 kilometers south of Alicante airport, this charming village enjoys a Mediterranean climate with 320 days of annual sunshine, moderate winter temperatures, and warm summers tempered by sea breezes. The region's geography features gently rolling terrain dotted with golf courses, suburban developments, and traditional Spanish agriculture. Algorfa's elevation of approximately 50 meters provides natural ventilation and eliminates coastal flooding concerns. The area has undergone sophisticated development over the past two decades, attracting successful professionals and established families who value community, quality of life, and connection to nature. Unlike overcrowded coastal towns, Algorfa maintains authentic Spanish character while providing modern infrastructure and international amenities. The village serves as a gateway to both beaches and the scenic inland regions of Costa Blanca, making it ideal for those seeking balance between seaside access and countryside tranquility.
lifestyleSection: Living in Algorfa means joining an established international community of accomplished professionals, entrepreneurs, and retirees who have deliberately chosen substance over superficial coastal tourism. Daily life centers around La Finca Golf, an 18-hole championship course designed by Pepe Gancedo that attracts golfers from throughout Europe. The English-speaking community ensures seamless integration for international residents, with frequent social events, dining clubs, and cultural activities. Beach access is remarkably convenient—Guardamar's pristine sandy beaches are just 15 minutes away, while the elegant resort beaches of La Mata provide alternative coastal experiences within 20 minutes. The region supports excellent international restaurants, fine dining establishments, and traditional Spanish tavernas in nearby Rojales and Torrevieja. Weekly markets provide fresh local produce, while major supermarkets including Mercadona offer comprehensive shopping within 10 minutes. Healthcare standards exceed expectations, with Hospital de Torrevieja providing sophisticated medical facilities and English-speaking practitioners. The lifestyle appeals to professionals seeking Mediterranean quality without sacrificing career connectivity—reliable broadband and proximity to business hubs ensure continued productivity for those maintaining professional interests.
investmentSection: This villa represents an astute investment in one of Costa Blanca's most stable real estate markets. The region has experienced consistent 12% year-on-year price appreciation, outperforming both national and international benchmarks. At €2,213 per square meter, this property trades at a significant discount to coastal equivalents—comparable six-bedroom villas in beachfront communities command €4,000-€5,000 per square meter. The rental market demonstrates exceptional strength, with weekly lettings averaging €900 for properties of this caliber, suggesting annual rental income potential of €46,800. This positions the property attractively for investors seeking both capital appreciation and income generation. La Finca Golf's status as an established, desirable community ensures sustained demand from international buyers. Currency diversification appeals to investors holding non-euro assets, while Spain's favorable tax treaties with numerous countries enhance investment attractiveness. The property's substantial size and premium specification command premium rental rates from discerning tenants seeking privacy and amenities.
conclusion: This exceptional villa at La Finca Golf represents more than a property acquisition—it embodies a lifestyle choice reflecting your appreciation for quality, privacy, and sophisticated Mediterranean living. The combination of premium specification, investment potential, and prestigious community position makes this property exceptionally compelling for discerning international buyers. At €965,000, this villa offers extraordinary value without compromise on prestige or amenities.
